org.jppf.utils.stats

Class JPPFSnapshot.LabelBasedFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jppf.utils.stats.JPPFSnapshot.LabelBasedFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JPPFStatistics.Filter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JPPFSnapshot.LabelExcludingFilter, JPPFSnapshot.LabelIncludingFilter
    Enclosing interface:
    JPPFSnapshot

    public abstract static class JPPFSnapshot.LabelBasedFilter
extends Object
implements JPPFStatistics.Filter
    Base class for filters including or excluding snpashots based on a provided set of labels.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean includeFlag
      Determines whether to include or exclude the snapshots.
      protected Set<String> labels
      The set of labels to exclude.
